right_panel.chat-text-css: border: 2px solid #ccc; border-radius: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #444; color: white;
right_panel.user-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 2px solid #DD9955; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 100px; background-color: #FFFDFD; color: black;
right_panel.ai-message-css: vertical-align: text-top;; border: 2px solid #9955DD; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 100px; background-color: #FDFDFF; color: black;
